description: Example configuration for AI Time Machines service integrations
documentation: This file documents expected environment variables and service configurations. DO NOT commit actual secrets - use GitHub Secrets or .env files instead.

secrets.note: All secrets should be configured as GitHub repository secrets or in .env (not committed)

required.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
required.description: OpenAI API key for ChatGPT and other AI services

optional.name: MANYCHAT_API_KEY
optional.description: ManyChat API key for Facebook Messenger chatbot integration

optional.name: BOTBUILDERS_API_KEY
optional.description: BotBuilders API key for multi-platform chatbot integration

optional.name: MOLTBOOK_API_KEY
optional.description: Moltbook API key for interactive notebook platform

optional.name: MOLTBOT_API_KEY
optional.description: Moltbot API key for bot automation

optional.name: OPENCLAW_API_KEY
optional.description: OpenClaw API key for analytics and automation

optional.name: GITHUB_PAT
optional.description: GitHub Personal Access Token (only if cross-repo API calls needed)
optional.obtain_from: GitHub Settings > Developer settings > Personal access tokens

optional.name: WEBHOOK_URL
optional.description: Generic webhook URL for external integrations

service_base_urls.note: Optional service base URLs can be configured via environment variables or GitHub Secrets if they contain sensitive deployment information
service_base_urls.pattern: SERVICE_BASE_URL_* - naming convention uses SERVICE_BASE_URL_ prefix followed by service name (matching the API key suffix)

examples.name: SERVICE_BASE_URL_OPENCLAW
examples.description: Base URL for OpenClaw API (matches OPENCLAW_API_KEY)

examples.name: SERVICE_BASE_URL_MANYCHAT
examples.description: Base URL for ManyChat API (matches MANYCHAT_API_KEY)

examples.name: SERVICE_BASE_URL_BOTBUILDERS
examples.description: Base URL for BotBuilders API (matches BOTBUILDERS_API_KEY)

examples.name: SERVICE_BASE_URL_MOLTBOOK
examples.description: Base URL for Moltbook API (matches MOLTBOOK_API_KEY)

examples.name: SERVICE_BASE_URL_MOLTBOT
examples.description: Base URL for Moltbot API (matches MOLTBOT_API_KEY)

manychat.description: ManyChat integration for Facebook Messenger chatbots

usage.github_actions: Secrets are configured in GitHub repository settings under 'Secrets and variables > Actions'
usage.local_development: Copy .env.example to .env and fill in your actual values
usage.docker: Pass environment variables via docker-compose.yml or .env file
